mapper.select: select r.receipts_id receiptsId, r.receipts_load_id receiptsLoadId, r.receipts_bail_scale receiptsBailScale, r.receipts_bail_money receiptsBailMoney, r.receipts_evalue_money receiptsEvalueMoney, r.receipts_offer_pound receiptsOfferPound, r.receipts_zh_money receiptsZhMoney, r.receipts_plat_money receiptsPlatMoney, r.create_time createTime,r.update_time updateTime, r.create_per createPer, r.update_per updatePer, o.offer_money receiptsOfferMoney,o.month_scale receiptsMonthScale,o.offer_limit receiptsOfferLimit, l.customer_name customerName,l.loan_status loanStatus,l.apply_time applyTime,l.id loanId from t_receipts_loan_offer r LEFT JOIN t_loan l ON r.receipts_load_id=l.id LEFT JOIN t_loan_offer o ON o.load_id=l.id limit #{page},#{pageSize}
select count(*) countx from t_receipts_loan_offer r LEFT JOIN t_loan l ON r.receipts_load_id=l.id LEFT JOIN t_loan_offer o ON o.load_id=l.id

select r.receipts_id receiptsId, r.receipts_load_id receiptsLoadId, r.receipts_bail_scale receiptsBailScale, r.receipts_bail_money receiptsBailMoney, r.receipts_evalue_money receiptsEvalueMoney, r.receipts_offer_pound receiptsOfferPound, r.receipts_zh_money receiptsZhMoney, r.receipts_plat_money receiptsPlatMoney, r.receipts_offer_money receiptsOfferMoney, r.receipts_month_scale receiptsMonthScale, r.receipts_offer_limit receiptsOfferLimit, r.create_time createTime,r.update_time updateTime, r.create_per createPer, r.update_per updatePer from t_receipts_loan_offer r where receipts_id=#{receiptsId}
